channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China has a ‘near monopoly’ on many critical minerals. JPMorgan says it could be the ‘next battleground’ with the U.S.
item.description: The U.S. is 100% reliant on imports for 12 minerals that are key to the production of semiconductors and other high-tech products.

item.title: OpenAI hires new CFO and product chief, announces Apple deal to integrate ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI hired a new CFO and product chief on Monday, and announced a partnership with Apple that includes an integration of ChatGPT and Siri.

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq end at new record highs
Ashton Kutcher sides with the enemy over actor and writer colleagues in AI debate: 'I can just generate and then watch my own movie'
item.description: Writers push back at the venture capitalist’s praise of OpenAI’s Sora.

item.title: FDA advisors recommend Eli Lilly's Alzheimer's drug donanemab, paving way for approval
item.description: If approved, Eli Lilly's donanemab would become the second Alzheimer's drug of its kind to enter the market after Leqembi from Biogen and Eisai.

item.title: The housing market’s pivotal spring selling season is coming to an end—not with a bang, but with a whimper
item.description: Capital Economics says “mortgage demand and sales activity won’t recover until rates fall meaningfully below 7%.” The research firm expects that to happen only later this year.

item.title: These stocks should be the cornerstone of an AI portfolio, according to Evercore ISI
item.description: Watch these AI-driven stocks that could be an essential part of investors' portfolios as the trend continues, Evercore ISI says.

item.title: Stocks ready to get on the road (again) to record highs, says UBS
The S&P 500 is crushing diversified funds. So if you didn't bet big on the U.S. stock index, 'then you look like a moron,' portfolio expert says
item.description: Diversified portfolios have trailed the US large-cap stock index in 13 of the last 15 years, a stretch seen only once before in almost a century of data.

item.title: CrowdStrike rallies to record on cybersecurity company's inclusion in S&P 500
item.description: CrowdStrike is joining the S&P 500, replacing Comerica, effective June 24.

item.title: GameStop’s stock slides as investors await next moves for meme stocks
The biggest announcements from Apple's most important event of the year—and quite possibly ever
item.description: Artificial intelligence—rather, Apple Intelligence—was the centerpiece of the company's keynote for WWDC 2024.

item.title: Katie Stockton on whether it's time to start worrying about the weak market breadth
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the recent concerns about market breadth.

item.title: PayPal shares turn lower as Apple teases money-transfer option
